metadata.name: See Within
metadata.description:
SEE WITHIN, THE LIGHT AND THE DARK

***Collector will receive the original digital painting (JPEG) after the sale completion.*** 

Why do we reflect on our actions, our past, ourselves? Is this how it is intended or how it is to be? Do we seek redemption or need to justify the penance?

I ponder still. 

A small glimpse into my own thought process, how I perceive my own actions, past and self. 
Convulted and broken, spiraling downwards into the mist of the light and the dark.


1080x1080 | H264 |
Blender | Photoshop | After Effects |
